description:
A hearty creamy potato soup with just the right amount of cheddar cheese, chives, and the subtle heat of black pepper.

  • Packaging clearly shows allergens and nutritional information, and has a graduated scale on one side, so you know how much water to add
  • Ingredients: dehydrated potatoes, cheddar cheese powder (cheddar cheese [milk, salt, bacterial cultures, enzymes], disodium phosphate, *may contain sodium aluminum silicate), potato starch, modified milk ingredients, onion, milk ingredients, onion, sea salt, dried garlic, red and green bell pepper, natural flavour, butter powder (butter, skim milk powder, sodium caseinate, sodium phosphate), seasoning (yeast extract, salt, canola oil), black pepper, chives, and thyme
  • Allergens - contains: milk
  • No cooking needed, simply add water, stir, wait and enjoy
  • Meals have a 5-year shelf life
name: AlpineAire Country Potato Soup with Cheddar and Chives
